content:
Hello. Dumb question, but a few Googles and playing around with the settings didn't help.

Is anyone working on rustc with VSCode and the rust-analyzer extension? If so, can you share the essential parts of your settings.json? Thanks a bunch.
As an aside, "rust-analyzer.rustcSource": "${workspaceFolder}" doesn't seem to help.
I don't use rust-analyzer, but I know there are some docs for setting it up here: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/building/suggested.html#configuring-rust-analyzer-for-rustc
Thank you! : :tada:
